CWEs: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function does not properly sanitize the 'token.content' input before using it to generate HTML content. This could allow an attacker to inject malicious scripts into the web page, leading to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks. The attacker could steal sensitive information, perform actions on behalf of the user, or exploit other vulnerabilities in the web application.
